function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contaminated surfaces in hospitals and healthcare settings","Impact":"Risk of virus transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Frequent and thorough surface disinfection","Technologies":"UV disinfection robots","People":"Hospital staff, patients, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facilities management"},{"Description":"Potential exposure to infected individuals during sample collection and patient support","Impact":"Risk of virus transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Utilization of autonomous robots for sample collection and patient support","Technologies":"Autonomous robots with sample collection and patient support capabilities","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, isolated individuals","Owner":"Healthcare facilities management"},{"Description":"Risk of virus transmission through traditional delivery mechanisms","Impact":"Potential spread of virus through delivery processes","Mitigation":"Use of autonomous vehicles for delivery to reduce human contact and transmission risk","Technologies":"Autonomous vehicles for delivery","People":"Delivery personnel, recipients of deliveries","Owner":"Delivery companies"}]}
